conbody.p: A fill in the blanks is a type of question where students must fill in the blanks in given text. Multiple correct options may be specified for each blank. These types of question are scored ... _fixme_

fig.title: Question type: Fill in the blanks _fixme_ [ui]

image.alt: Question type: Fill in the blanks

conbody.p: Select Fill in the blanks as the question type and enter the text into the editor panel ( ) marking the blanks with <..> symbols.
Enter the correct fill-in text between the < and >. Multiple options can be specified by separating them with a semicolon, for example <dog;cat>.
